channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: This Week in Explainers: From Musketeers to ‘poop suitcase’, how Putin is protected
History Today: How Japan staged a surprise attack on Pearl Harbour
Netflix to buy Warner Bros: Will viewers end up paying higher costs?
Gurpreet Singh Rehal: The British Sikh businessman sanctioned by UK over supporting Khalistan terror group
IndiGo crisis: Cancelled flights, refunds & more… All your questions answered
This Week in Explainers: Why IndiGo, India’s biggest airline, is facing an unprecedented crisis
New report, old realities: Balochistan remains under Pakistan’s brutal siege
item.description: Violence in Balochistan is not incidental; it is systemic, structured, and historically produced

item.title: Putin’s New Delhi visit: Towards a multipolar world, breaking the G2 cage
item.description: The India-Russia summit was a clear assertion of shared strategic autonomy of both the nations and their commitment to a multipolar world in the face of growing pressure for a G2-style global order

item.title: Putin’s visit delivers a big message: India has options, Russia is not isolated
item.description: India effectively signalled its commitment to charting an independent foreign policy path and rejection of a ‘with us or against us’ narrative

item.title: Modi presents Bhagavad Gita to Putin: How PM’s gifts reflect deep Indian symbolism
item.description: Unlike the claims made by the colonialists and their sympathisers in the country that no notion of ‘India’ existed before the advent of the British, the celebration of India’s millennia-old symbols in the form of gifts reinforces the country’s ancient identity

item.title: Pakistan’s evergreen poppy economy is undergoing a silent surge
item.description: As Afghanistan enforces a near-total poppy ban, Pakistan’s Balochistan emerges as the new centre of a resurgent opium economy. State complicity, militant financing, and expanding trafficking routes now threaten to reshape the drug landscape of South and West Asia

item.title: Putin in Delhi: India can deepen Russia relations while keeping Washington close
item.description: India and Russia can have closer ties, but this should not come at the cost of New Delhi’s relations with Washington, DC
